name: Pucks Hole
description:
Pucks Hole is a challenging puzzle game!

Throwing the puck into the hole sounds easy right? well... not when you have a block in front of you or a wind zone that push the ball to another direction, use the obstacles to bounce around and clear the level. Think the best direction before throwing your puck, think before shoot!

How to play:

Touch and hold anywhere and move your finger towards the direction you want to shoot and then release it!

Highlights

-80 satisfiying & challenging levels

-Unlock amazing puck skins that fit your style!

-Clean design and amazing colors

-Easy to play, just one finger needed :) touch anywhere

-Endless gameplay mode to show off how good you are!

-More levels coming soon!

Help us make this game better by giving us a review :)

What level did you reach?
